nl.esciencecenter.esight.math

Class VectorFMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.math.VectorFMath

  • public class VectorFMath
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for float vector calculations.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

      • bezierCurve

        public static VecF4[] bezierCurve(int steps,
                  VecF4 startLocation,
                  VecF3 startControl,
                  VecF3 endControl,
                  VecF4 endLocation)
        Bezier curve interpolation between two points with control vectors (this could be particle speed at the points).
        Parameters:
        steps - The number of steps on the bezier curve to calculate.
        startLocation - The starting point for this bezier curve.
        startControl - The starting point's control vector.
        endControl - The end point for this bezier curve.
        endLocation - The end point's control vector.
        Returns:
        The array of points on the new bezier curve.

      • degreesBezierCurve

        public static VecF3[] degreesBezierCurve(int steps,
                         VecF3 startLocation,
                         VecF3 startControl,
                         VecF3 endControl,
                         VecF3 endLocation)
        Bezier curve interpolation for _rotation_ between two points with control vectors (this could be particle speed at the points). Outputs a number of degrees for rotations.
        Parameters:
        steps - The number of steps on the bezier curve to calculate.
        startLocation - The starting point for this bezier curve.
        startControl - The starting point's control vector.
        endControl - The end point for this bezier curve.
        endLocation - The end point's control vector.
        Returns:
        The array of points on the new bezier curve.
